snippet: A 46-year-old regular at the Drunken Monkey who was trying to break up a fight was killed when he was struck and fell backward, his head hitting the pavement.
abstract: Abdou Cisse, a regular at Staten Island bar known as the Drunken Monkey, dies after striking his head on pavement when he is punched while trying to break up a fight; detectives are searching for two suspects in their 20s who fled together in a dark-colored car.
lead_paragraph: A 46-year-old regular at the Drunken Monkey who was trying to break up a fight was killed when he was struck and fell backward, his head hitting the pavement.

headline.seo: Fatal Encounter Near Drunken Monkey Is Under Investigation
headline.main: Trying to Stop Fight at Staten Island Bar, Man Dies After He Is Punched
headline.print_headline: Trying to Stop Bar Fight, Man Dies After a Punch
